mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_SEQ,ID,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,GRADE,EMAIL,BIRTHDAY,PHONE,ADDR,MEMBERSHIP,DELFLAG,REGDATE FROM MEMBER_BOARD WHERE ID = #{id} AND DELFLAG='N'
SELECT MEMBER_SEQ,ID,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,GRADE,EMAIL,BIRTHDAY,PHONE,ADDR,MEMBERSHIP,DELFLAG,REGDATE FROM MEMBER_BOARD WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw} AND DELFLAG='N'
SELECT MEMBER_SEQ,ID,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,GRADE,EMAIL,BIRTHDAY,PHONE,ADDR,MEMBERSHIP,DELFLAG,REGDATE FROM MEMBER_BOARD WHERE NAME=#{name} AND EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT MEMBER_SEQ,ID,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,GRADE,EMAIL,BIRTHDAY,PHONE,ADDR,MEMBERSHIP,DELFLAG,REGDATE FROM MEMBER_BOARD WHERE NAME=#{name} AND ID=#{id} AND EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_BOARD SET PW =#{pw} WHERE NAME=#{name} AND ID=#{id} AND EMAIL=#{email}
